title: Assessing the utility of FDG PET/CT study in diagnosis of early acute appendicitis
details: S Pallod, R Chatta, R Ramadosan, H Shah - Emergency Radiology, 2025
abstract: Acute appendicitis is a common surgical emergency that can be challenging to diagnose due to its varied clinical presentations. Standard imaging methods include ultrasonography, computed tomography (CT), and Magnetic resonance imaging …
